title: Covid-19: Calls to give NHS staff priority access to lateral flow tests
content:
1. Covid-19: Calls to give NHS staff priority access to lateral flow tests  BBC News
  2. Lateral flow tests to be ‘constrained’ over next two weeks, warns Sajid Javid  The Guardian
  3. How to get a more accurate lateral flow result for the Omicron variant, according to an expert  My London
  4. Editorial: Without lateral flow tests government policy is in jeopardy  The Independent
  5. COVID test shortage 'very worrying' after Boris Johnson gives New Year's Eve parties the thumbs up  Yahoo News UK
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid-19: Calls to give NHS staff priority access to lateral flow tests  BBC News
